articles.title: How California struck a landmark law to rein in rogue AI - Politico
articles.description: Insider accounts detail the late-night negotiating, tech giant tug-of-war and last-minute interventions that brought the first-in-nation measure to life.
articles.content: The process also highlighted the stakes for the top Democrats involved: Newsom, a likely 2028 presidential contender, and the bills author, state Sen. Scott Wiener, who carried more ambitious AI legi… [+20249 chars]

articles.title: I Have a Magic Eye and a Magic Hand: 2 Days With Meta's Display Glasses - CNET
